CustomField.description: wd field Administrative field to determine if a response is tied to an opportunity, and if so, the status of that opportunity
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(ContactId), ISBLANK( FCR_Opportunity__c ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, 'Resolved - Non-Response RT') ), 0, IF(FCR_Opportunity__r.IsClosed , IF(FCR_Opportunity__r.IsWon , 2, 3), 1) ) /* 0 - Lead or no opportunity 1 - Open opportunity 2 - Opportunity closed won 3 - Opportunity closed lost */
CustomField.label: Admin Opportunity Status
